sections.heading: this chapter, unless otherwise expressly stated:
sections.text: this chapter, unless otherwise expressly stated:

sections.heading: 02Judgment, obligor not party, not discharged
sections.text: A judgment against one or more of several obligors, or against one or more of joint, or of joint and several obligors shall not discharge a co-obligor who was not a party to the proceeding wherein the judgment was rendered.

sections.heading: credited, limitation.The amount or value of any consideration received by the obligee from one or more of several obligors, or from one or more of joint, or of joint and several obligors, in whole or in partial satisfaction of their obligations, shall be credited to the extent of the amount received
sections.text: credited, limitation.The amount or value of any consideration received by the obligee from one or more of several obligors, or from one or more of joint, or of joint and several obligors, in whole or in partial satisfaction of their obligations, shall be credited to the extent of the amount received on the obligations of all co-obligors to whom the obligor or obligors giving the consideration did not stand in the relation of a surety.

sections.heading: of some, effect.Subject to s.113
sections.text: 03, the obligee’s release or discharge of one or more of several obligors, or of one or more of joint, or of joint and several obligors shall not discharge co-obligors, against whom the obligee in writing and as part of the same transaction as the release or discharg

sections.heading: of obligor, estate liable.On the death of a joint obligor in contract, the joint obligor’s personal representative or estate shall be jointly and severally bound with the surviving obligor or obligors
sections.text: of obligor, estate liable.On the death of a joint obligor in contract, the joint obligor’s personal representative or estate shall be jointly and severally bound with the surviving obligor or obligors.

sections.heading: retroactive.This chapter shall not apply to obligations arising prior to June 17, 1927.
sections.text: retroactive.This chapter shall not apply to obligations arising prior to June 17, 1927.

sections.heading: title.This chapter may be cited as the “Uniform Joint Obligations Act”.
sections.text: title.This chapter may be cited as the “Uniform Joint Obligations Act”.

sections.heading: acts or parts of acts inconsistent with this chapter are repealed.
sections.text: acts or parts of acts inconsistent with this chapter are repealed.

sections.heading: Wisconsin Statutes updatedthrough 2025 Wis
sections.text: Act 82 and through all Supreme Court Orders and Controlled Substances Board Orders filed before and in effect on January 30, 2026.Published andcertifiedunder s. 35.18. Changes effective after January 30, 2026, are designated by NOTES.(Published 1-30-26)
